#include<cstdio>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

string s,x;
int  i,j,k,t,n;
map <string,int> mapa;
int main()
{
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for (k=1;k<=t;k++)
    {
        cin>>s;
        n=s.size();

        for(i=0;i<=n-1;i++)
          for (j=i;j<=n-1;j++)
          {
              x=s.substr(i,j-i+1);
              mapa[x]++;
              
          }
        printf("%d\n",mapa.size());
        mapa.clear();
    }
}
